site.title: Luke Harper
site.description: IT Professional specialising in Azure/365, Active Directory, Virtualisation, and Citrix technologies

about.title: About Me
content: I am an experienced Infrastructure Engineer / Systems Administrator / Cloud Architect with over a decade of experience in the industry, with a wide skill set and understanding of a vast amount of different technologies.
My focus is on creating efficient, secure, and scalable IT environments that enable businesses to operate effectively in today's digital landscape.
Please refer to my Skills page for more information about myself.

categories.name: Azure/365
items: Azure Infrastructure:
Deployed several Azure environments hosting a variety of instances and use cases
Deployed and managed virtual instances to provide redundant low latency services worldwide
Managed web hosting in Azure
Azure Identity & Security:
Utilised Azure Active Directory to allow customers to work entirely off Azure with seamless SSO
Deployed ADFS to allow seamless SSO and configured it to work with both native and third party applications along with externally facing two factor security
Office 365:
Migrated users to Office 365 from a variety of different mail solutions with zero issues
